title: post v1 messages create message with inline embeddings
description: Test the POST /v1/messages endpoint to verify that a message is stored successfully with inline embedding generation, and the response returns the stored message with embedding_status as completed.

title: post v1 messages create message with async embedding job
description: Test the POST /v1/messages endpoint to verify that a message is stored successfully and an embedding job is enqueued asynchronously, returning a 202 response with embedding_status as pending.

title: get v1 messages message by id success
description: Test the GET /v1/messages/{message_id} endpoint to fetch a stored message by its UUID, verifying the response contains the correct message data and returns 200 status.

title: get v1 messages message by id not found
description: Test the GET /v1/messages/{message_id} endpoint with a non-existent UUID to verify that the API returns a 404 status indicating the message was not found.

title: get v1 memory search semantic search results
description: Test the GET /v1/memory/search endpoint to verify that semantic search returns top-k relevant memories filtered by tenant and optional conversation, with results including similarity, decay, and importance scores.

title: post v1 admin retention run apply retention policies
description: Test the POST /v1/admin/retention/run endpoint to trigger retention policies for a tenant, verifying that messages are archived or deleted according to specified actions, and the response includes counts of archived and deleted messages.

title: get v1 admin health liveness check
description: Test the GET /v1/admin/health endpoint to verify the service liveness and health status, ensuring the response includes status, database connectivity, and timestamp.

title: get v1 admin readiness readiness check
description: Test the GET /v1/admin/readiness endpoint to verify the service readiness status, ensuring the response indicates if the service is ready or degraded.

title: api key authentication enforcement
description: Test that all API endpoints enforce API key authentication by sending requests without or with invalid API keys and verifying that the response status is 401 Unauthorized.

title: rate limiting enforcement on api requests
description: Test that the API enforces configured rate limits globally and per-tenant by sending requests exceeding the limit and verifying that the response status is 429 Too Many Requests with appropriate headers.
